version_description:
Making Scan & Build better:
• Fixed an issue that sometimes caused the app to crash during scanning. It's all right now!
• Added Scan & Build support on iOS 13.

We changed the structure of the app to make it easier to use. Now there are two main sections: build and collect.
The build section has everything you need to scan the bricks and build something cool out of them. In the collection section, you keep track of your Lego sets and bricks.
A small technical update. By the way, fixed an issue that sometimes caused the search results screen to close itself.
We made a new story on how to build with Brickit and even added examples of what we managed to create ourselves. By the way, and we have a new icon!
